articles.author: Dylan Short
articles.title: U.S. Senator Joe Manchin takes part in jubilant tour of Alberta's energy sector - Calgary Herald
articles.description: Kenney continued to push the message that Canadian energy is needed in America as Manchin took part in a whirlwind two-day tour of Alberta.
articles.content:
Kenney and Manchin spoke of the hope to create a North American energy alliance to become less dependent on oil and gas coming from other parts of the world

articles.title: Heart complications uncommon for children and young adults after SARS-CoV-2 infection - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Heart complications are uncommon, yet treatable for children and young adults after COVID-19 disease or SARS-CoV-2 infection, according to a new scientific statement from the American Heart Association that details what has been learned about how to treat, ma…
